course_description: Prerequisite: 2nd year EPI/GLEPI students only. All others email instructor.  This course will teach students the basic skills in writing and presenting epidemiologic research in journal manuscripts, scientific posters, and oral presentations. The course is hands-on, learning by doing. Students will write a scientific manuscript during the course, which they summarize at the end in a poster and a presentation. This course is ideal for students who want to publish their thesis project in a scientific journal. It is highly recommended that students discuss the project with their supervisor and have access to the study data before the start of the course to prevent delays in the writing.
prerequisites: This class is for students enrolled in the EPIMPH, or EPIMSPH, or GLEPIMPH, or GLEPIMSPH plans only.
